channel.title: Breaking Bread with Tom Papa
channel.description:
Comedian and bread baker, Tom Papa, is the perfect host, inviting guests to join him

for an hour of eating, drinking and enjoying life. Listeners are invited to take a seat

at the table as Tom and his guests celebrate the true meaning of breaking bread with

insightful, revealing and always funny conversations.
channel.itunes:summary:
Comedian and bread baker, Tom Papa, is the perfect host, inviting guests to join him
for an hour of eating, drinking and enjoying life. Listeners are invited to take a seat
at the table as Tom and his guests celebrate the true meaning of breaking bread with
insightful, revealing and always funny conversations.
channel.itunes:author: All Things Comedy

item.itunes:title: Episode 127 - Morgan James

item.title: Episode 124 - Patton Oswalt

item.itunes:title: Episode 123 - Rory Scovel

item.title: Episode 122 - The Sklar Brothers Return

item.title: Episode 121 - Sam Morril
item.itunes:title: Episode 121 - Sam Morril
item.description: The hilarious Sam Morril talks about his new Netflix Special 'Same Time Tomorrow' and ate half his bread by the time he left the table.

item.content:encoded: Chad and JT Go Deep into a box of donuts. Check out their new hilarious show on Netflix.

item.title: Episode 119 - Jade Catta-Preta
item.itunes:title: Episode 119 - Jade Catta-Preta

item.content:encoded: Jade Catta-Preta brings her new Netflix show Hotties to the table. It might not be what you're thinking.

item.title: Episode 118 - Leanne Morgan Returns
item.itunes:title: Episode 118 - Leanne Morgan Returns

item.content:encoded: The hilarious and lovely Leanne Morgan returns with great stories and diet advice.

item.title: Episode 117 - Ryan Hamilton
item.itunes:title: Episode 117 - Ryan Hamilton

item.title: Episode 116 - Katie Parla
item.itunes:title: Episode 116 - Katie Parla
item.description: Katie Parla is a New York Times Best Selling cookbook author based in Rome where she is waiting for me to deliver bread to her!
item.content:encoded: Katie Parla is a New York Times Best Selling cookbook author based in Rome where she is waiting for me to deliver bread to her!

item.title: Episode 115 - Andy Kadin Returns
item.itunes:title: Episode 115 - Andy Kadin Returns

item.content:encoded: Bub and Grandma's Bread is opening its doors to you and me and everybody and Andy Kadin is here to tell us all about it!

item.title: Episode 114 - Gabrielle Reece
item.itunes:title: Episode 114 - Gabrielle Reece
item.description: Gabrielle Reece is an athlete, model, and host of The Gabby Reece Show podcast. She makes the world better and for that she gets bread!
item.content:encoded: Gabrielle Reece is an athlete, model, and host of The Gabby Reece Show podcast. She makes the world better and for that she gets bread!

item.title: Episode 113 - Pig Beach BBQ
item.itunes:title: Episode 113 - Pig Beach BBQ
item.description: Let's fire up the smoker with the boys from Pig Beach BBQ - Matt Abdoo and Shane McBride have the cookbook that will save your summer.
item.content:encoded: Let's fire up the smoker with the boys from Pig Beach BBQ - Matt Abdoo and Shane McBride have the cookbook that will save your summer.

item.itunes:title: Episode 111 - Anthony Giglio Returns

item.content:encoded: The great Anthony Giglio comes by to teach us about wine and save our summer!

item.itunes:title: Episode 110 - Ali Macofsky

item.title: Episode 108 - Kwame Onwuachi
item.itunes:title: Episode 108 - Kwame Onwuachi
item.description: Kwame Onwuachi, the author of 'My America - Recipes From A Black Chef' shares the ingredients of his life and career.
item.content:encoded: Kwame Onwuachi, the author of 'My America - Recipes From A Black Chef' shares the ingredients of his life and career.

item.title: Episode 107 - Kevin Bludso & Noah Galuten
item.itunes:title: Episode 107 - Kevin Bludso & Noah Galuten

item.content:encoded: It's time to feed Phil Rosenthal who's traveled the world on his way to our table. Season 5 of Somebody Feed Phil is available now on Netflix!

item.content:encoded: Mr. Comedy, Judd Apatow shares his new doc 'George Carlin's American Dream' and I share bread and Ciambella! Also check out Judd’s new book of interviews ‘Sicker in the Head!’

item.itunes:title: Episode 104 - Leanne Morgan

item.itunes:title: Episode 98 - Jeff Ross

item.content:encoded: When my pal the Roastmaster General Jeff Ross comes to the table I had no choice but to break TWO loaves!

item.itunes:title: Episode 96 - Tom Rhodes

item.content:encoded: The great and soulful  comedian Tom Rhodes joins me at the table for Ukrainian sweets and some mighty bread.

item.title: Episode 93 - Maeve Higgins
item.itunes:title: Episode 93 - Maeve Higgins

item.content:encoded: This week the very funny and insightful Maeve Higgins has a new book, 'Tell Everyone On This Train I Love Them' and a new friend - me!

item.itunes:title: Episode 92 - Ari Shaffir

item.content:encoded: Only the great Ari Shaffir could share his insights on kosher baked goods and ayahuasca in a single visit.

item.title: Episode 91 - David Cross
item.itunes:title: Episode 91 - David Cross

item.content:encoded: The great David Cross shares his new standup special 'I'm From The Future' (available February 12th at OfficialDavidCross.com) and wisdom about drinking and eating.

item.itunes:title: Episode 90 - Misunderstood Whiskey

item.content:encoded: The king of burgers George Motz helps save America and keep us well fed.

item.title: Episode 88 - Jim Gaffigan
item.itunes:title: Episode 88 - Jim Gaffigan

item.content:encoded: The perfect guest has arrived! My good friend Jim Gaffigan comes by to eat donuts, get bread and talk about his new Netflix special Comedy Monster!

item.title: Episode 87 - Dan Richer
item.itunes:title: Episode 87 - Dan Richer
item.description: Dan Richer, the pizza master and owner of Razza in Jersey City, promises to be my Yoda and show me the way to the perfect pie. We can do this!
item.content:encoded: Dan Richer, the pizza master and owner of Razza in Jersey City, promises to be my Yoda and show me the way to the perfect pie. We can do this!

item.title: Episode 86 - 2022 Kick Off
item.itunes:title: Episode 86 - 2022 Kick Off
item.description: We kick off the new year with the best rigatoni recipe, the best books and the best resolution to eat more!
item.content:encoded: We kick off the new year with the best rigatoni recipe, the best books and the best resolution to eat more!

item.itunes:title: Episode 84 - Anthony Giglio

item.content:encoded: Anthony Giglio is one of the funniest wine experts in the world, so naturally we are good friends and we reunite at the table this week, just in time for the holidays. https://www.anthonygiglio.com/

item.title: Episode 81 - Fielding Edlow & Larry Clarke

item.title: Episode 78 - Jackie Kashian returns!
item.itunes:title: Episode 78 - Jackie Kashian returns!
item.description: Jackie Kashian is super smart, super funny, and makes a super chili. Look for her new album, Stay-Kashian, launching on YouTube Nov. 16th.
item.content:encoded: Jackie Kashian is super smart, super funny, and makes a super chili. Look for her new album, Stay-Kashian, launching on YouTube Nov. 16th.

item.itunes:title: Episode 77 - Ricky Velez

item.itunes:title: Episode 76 - Laurie Woolever

item.title: Episode 75 - Tony Hale
item.itunes:title: Episode 75 - Tony Hale

item.title: Episode 74 - Scott Conant
item.itunes:title: Episode 74 - Scott Conant
item.description: Tom is joined by chef and restaurateur Scott Conant who shares secrets from his new book Peace, Love & Pasta.And it's time for a Quick Bite with martini loving Dave Hill.

item.itunes:title: Episode 73 - Ian Bagg
item.description: Tom is joined by one of his very first comedian pals, the mighty Canadian comedian Ian Bagg! They return to the days in New York when they were new comics living the life one diner at a time.
item.content:encoded: Tom is joined by one of his very first comedian pals, the mighty Canadian comedian Ian Bagg! They return to the days in New York when they were new comics living the life one diner at a time.

item.itunes:title: Episode 72 - Maz Jobrani

item.itunes:title: Episode 71 - Leslie Jones
item.description: Tom breaks bread with his biggest bread fan, the super funny comedy force, Leslie Jones. We learn about mystery owls, creepy eels and what makes her so funny. Look for Leslie on the new season of Supermarket Sweep Sundays on ABC.

item.itunes:title: Episode 66 - The Sklar Brothers

item.title: Stars, Stripes and Maple Leafs - Trailer
item.itunes:title: Stars, Stripes and Maple Leafs - Trailer
item.description:
New podcast hosted by Tom Papa (American) and Sara Singer Schiff (Canadian). Each Wednesday, Tom and Sara will debate what makes each country different but so much alike. From food, politics, celebs, culture, and all things Candiaid/American. 

Subscribe to never miss an episode.

https://bit.ly/StarsStripesMapleLeafsPodcast
item.content:encoded:
New podcast hosted by Tom Papa (American) and Sara Singer Schiff (Canadian). Each Wednesday, Tom and Sara will debate what makes each country different but so much alike. From food, politics, celebs, culture, and all things Candiaid/American. 

Subscribe to never miss an episode.

https://bit.ly/StarsStripesMapleLeafsPodcast
item.itunes:author: All Things Comedy

item.title: Episode 65 - Jessimae Peluso
item.itunes:title: Episode 65 - Jessimae Peluso
item.description: I'm joined by an Italian American angel, comedian and host of The Sharp Tongue Podcast, Jessimae Peluso. We talk comedy and all things Italian food and family. And look for her new show, Tattoo Redo, on Netflix.
item.content:encoded: I'm joined by an Italian American angel, comedian and host of The Sharp Tongue Podcast, Jessimae Peluso. We talk comedy and all things Italian food and family. And look for her new show, Tattoo Redo, on Netflix.
item.itunes:author: All Things Comedy

item.title: Episode 64 - Taylor Tomlinson
item.itunes:title: Episode 64 - Taylor Tomlinson
item.description: The hilarious and soulful Taylor Tomlinson joins me at the table and we grab a Quick Bite with the mighty Stavros Halkius!
item.content:encoded: The hilarious and soulful Taylor Tomlinson joins me at the table and we grab a Quick Bite with the mighty Stavros Halkius!
item.itunes:author: All Things Comedy

item.title: Episode 63 - Andre Gaines & Dr. Christian C. Gregory
item.itunes:title: Episode 63 - Andre Gaines & Dr. Christian C. Gregory
item.description: Filmmakers Andre Gaines and Dr. Christian C.Gregory break bread and discuss the making of 'The One and Only Dick Gregory' on Showtime. Amazing people and an amazing film!
item.content:encoded: Filmmakers Andre Gaines and Dr. Christian C.Gregory break bread and discuss the making of 'The One and Only Dick Gregory' on Showtime. Amazing people and an amazing film!

item.itunes:title: Episode 62 - Ian Edwards

item.title: Episode 61 - Lara Beitz
item.itunes:title: Episode 61 - Lara Beitz

item.content:encoded: Lara Beitz is a truly original comedian who I immediately had to break bread with. You are going to love meeting her and we try not to chew too loudly.

item.title: Episode 60 - Billy Gardell
item.itunes:title: Episode 60 - Billy Gardell
item.description: Comedy powerhouse Billy Gardell comes by for some beautiful bread and we grab a Quick Bite with Rory Scovel who just released "Live Without Fear" on YouTube.
item.content:encoded: Comedy powerhouse Billy Gardell comes by for some beautiful bread and we grab a Quick Bite with Rory Scovel who just released "Live Without Fear" on YouTube.

item.title: Episode 58 - Duncan Trussell Returns
item.itunes:title: Episode 58 - Duncan Trussell Returns
item.description: LOVE this one! Two of my favorites - the great Duncan Trussell helps with an existential bagel crisis and the lovely Lizzy Cooperman puts peacocks on the menu. Scones!

item.title: Episode 54 - Jim Serpico
item.itunes:title: Episode 54 - Jim Serpico

item.title: Episode 53 - Lodge Bread
item.itunes:title: Episode 53 - Lodge Bread
item.description:
Bread meet bread! Today I sit down with the co-founders of Lodge Bread, Or Amsalam and Alexander Phaneuf.  They are two amazing bakers who have all of LA raving about their bread and with good reason!  

Today's podcast is brought to you by Helix Sleep - Go to Helixsleep.com/PAPA, take their two minute sleep quiz and find your perfect mattress.

item.title: Episode 52 - Inon & Natalie Shampanier
item.itunes:title: Episode 52 - Inon & Natalie Shampanier
item.description: I'm in a movie called Paper Spiders out now!  I sit down with the filmmakers Inon and Natalie Shampanier, who are smart and talented and bring me humus! I call Joey Diaz for a Quick Bite and advice on a great lasagna!
item.content:encoded: I'm in a movie called Paper Spiders out now!  I sit down with the filmmakers Inon and Natalie Shampanier, who are smart and talented and bring me humus! I call Joey Diaz for a Quick Bite and advice on a great lasagna!

item.title: Episode 51 - Rich Vos
item.itunes:title: Episode 51 - Rich Vos
item.description: When it comes to finding food on the road as a touring comedian no one is more detailed or funny that Rich Vos. And then we grab a quick bite with Bonnie McFarlane to find out why Rich is so crazy! I love them both.
item.content:encoded: When it comes to finding food on the road as a touring comedian no one is more detailed or funny that Rich Vos. And then we grab a quick bite with Bonnie McFarlane to find out why Rich is so crazy! I love them both.

item.itunes:title: Episode 50 - Wayne Federman

item.itunes:title: Episode 49 - Mikey Alfred

item.title: Episode 47 - Jesus Trejo
item.itunes:title: Episode 47 - Jesus Trejo
item.description: It's time to break pan with the very funny Jesus Trejo and learn his family capriotada secrets and love of tacos. And we grab a Quick Bite with Nate Bargatze who's new special Greatest Average American is streaming on Netflix.

item.title: Episode 46 - Sam Sifton
item.itunes:title: Episode 46 - Sam Sifton
item.description: It's a big one! We break bread with New York Times Food Editor, Sam Sifton, who has been a friend and guide during my food and bread journey. He has a great new book No-Recipe Recipes. And we get a Quick Bite with the great Colin Quinn, even though he hates sourdough!
item.content:encoded: It's a big one! We break bread with New York Times Food Editor, Sam Sifton, who has been a friend and guide during my food and bread journey. He has a great new book No-Recipe Recipes. And we get a Quick Bite with the great Colin Quinn, even though he hates sourdough!

item.title: Episode 45 - Kira Soltanovich Returns
item.itunes:title: Episode 45 - Kira Soltanovich Returns
item.description: Breaking bread live and in person with one of our favorite people, the very funny Kira Soltanovich and we grab a Quick Bite with our good pal Dave Koechner who drops a bombshell on us!

item.title: Episode 23 - Joe Rogan
item.itunes:title: Episode 23 - Joe Rogan
item.description:
This week I flew to Austin, TX to break bread with my good friend, comedian and podcast giant Joe Rogan. In many ways Joe is responsible for spreading the word about my bread and starting us on this fun journey and now we share it with you! 


Our pals at Wine Access and Helix Mattresses come along for the ride. 


Check out Wine Access Unfiltered wherever you listen to podcasts – premiering on 10/22!
item.content:encoded:
This week I flew to Austin, TX to break bread with my good friend, comedian and podcast giant Joe Rogan. In many ways Joe is responsible for spreading the word about my bread and starting us on this fun journey and now we share it with you! 


Our pals at Wine Access and Helix Mattresses come along for the ride. 


Check out Wine Access Unfiltered wherever you listen to podcasts – premiering on 10/22!

item.title: Episode 14 - Open Mike Eagle
item.itunes:title: Episode 14 - Open Mike Eagle
item.description:
It’s time to break bread with hip hop artist, comedian and all around creative force Open Mike Eagle. We travel from the early days in Chicago to his current Pop Tart struggles. Pull up a chair and enjoy!

And check out his new podcast What Had Happened Was.


Got to WineAccess.com/papa to get $20 off your first order of $50 or more!
item.content:encoded:
It’s time to break bread with hip hop artist, comedian and all around creative force Open Mike Eagle. We travel from the early days in Chicago to his current Pop Tart struggles. Pull up a chair and enjoy!

And check out his new podcast What Had Happened Was.


Got to WineAccess.com/papa to get $20 off your first order of $50 or more!

item.title: Episode 13 - Ken Forkish
item.itunes:title: Episode 13 - Ken Forkish
item.description: Let's go to Ken's Artisan Pizza in Portland, Oregon and break bread with one of my bread gurus, Ken Forkish. Ken has an amazing story and is the author of the bestselling book, 'Flour, Water, Salt, Yeast'. The breads from Ken's Artisan Bakery became an inspiration across the country and in my kitchen. Passion, bread and pizza!
item.content:encoded: Let's go to Ken's Artisan Pizza in Portland, Oregon and break bread with one of my bread gurus, Ken Forkish. Ken has an amazing story and is the author of the bestselling book, 'Flour, Water, Salt, Yeast'. The breads from Ken's Artisan Bakery became an inspiration across the country and in my kitchen. Passion, bread and pizza!

item.title: Episode 9 - Vito's Pizza
item.itunes:title: Episode 9 - Vito's Pizza
item.description: Come along to Vito's Pizza, the best New York Style pizza in LA! Vito shares a lifetime of stories and experience and sends me home with his secret dough. Give a listen and stop by 846 N. La Cienega Blvd. You'll love me forever.

item.itunes:title: Episode 8 - Dave Hill
item.description: Break out the cool glassware. This week my good friend and great comedian Dave Hill comes by as we continue our quest for the perfect martini. This one will turn your day into the perfect cocktail hour. Dave has a hilarious new album, The Pride of Cleveland.

item.itunes:title: Episode 4 - Greg Grunberg
item.description: Welcome to the family! This week Tom breaks bread with actor/producer Greg Grunberg. Greg takes us to his grandmother's kitchen for an amazing chicken sandwich and off to outer space as his co-pilot in Star Wars. Enjoy!

item.title: Episode 3 - Duncan Trussell
item.itunes:title: Episode 3 - Duncan Trussell
item.description: Tom breaks bread with the hilarious Duncan Trussell. While becoming fast friends, Duncan talks about the spiritual act of sharing food and his love of Southern Rice. Watch Duncan's new show The Midnight Gospel streaming on Netflix.

item.title: Breaking Bread with Tom Papa Trailer
item.itunes:title: Breaking Bread with Tom Papa Trailer
item.description:
​I used to do the typical comedian podcast ​like everybody else but then I realized that all of the great conversations I've ever had involved family, friends, and food! Somehow sharing a table together opens up memories of times unlike anything else. So now, I'm launching Breaking Bread with Tom Papa. A mix of all the things I love great guests, comedy, food, and wine. Join us for episodes every Tuesday!

Make sure to subscribe to Breaking Bread on Apple Podcast, Spotify, or wherever you get your podcasts! I can't wait to see you there.

Subscribe on Apple Podcast!

https://bit.ly/BreakingBreadApplePodcast

Subscribe on Spotify!

https://bit.ly/BreakingBreadSpotify

A mix of all the things I love great guests, comedy, food, and wine. Join us for episodes every Tuesday!
